    August Lan Party

    August 03, 2018

    Description

    Bring out your rigs! Bring out your consoles! But most of all bring your beautiful self!

    —POT LUCK— Bring your favorite dish to share with others!

    Cost of admission: (Event) BYOC = $10 (Event) = $15 (Hourly) = $3/hr

    ***This includes the hours from 8PM - 8AM.

    Why should you come? Computers are available on-site for use. Gigabit connections wirelessly* and wired. 30 Minutes of VR time is included within your event pricing. MASSIVE area for plenty of players and a chill-out space (Upstairs) to relax. (299 Occupancy limit) Monitors are available for console gamers.

    For any questions or concerns, please feel free to contact me. Stay on-top of updates and other events by joining the meetup group! (https://www.meetup.com/Utah-LAN-Group/)

    *Wireless up to 300Mbps / Wired up to 1 Gbps

    Details

    Date and Time

    August 03, 2018 - August 04, 2018

    08:00 PM - 08:00 AM

     View Event Page

    Location

    Game Tyrant

    650 N Main St.

    North Salt Lake Utah, 84054

    View Venue Page
